name: Venomoth

abilities.name: Shift
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may change the type of Venomoth to the type of any other Pokémon in play other than Colorless. This power can't be used if Venomoth is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Venom Powder
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

flavorText: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

strengths: Shift can change type to exploit weaknesses
Venom Powder inflicts both Confused and Poisoned
weaknesses: Shift requires other Pokemon types in play

competitiveHistory: Venomoth's Shift was an interesting tech option that allowed it to change types to exploit opponent weaknesses. However, the low damage output of Venom Powder limited its offensive potential.

rulings.ruling: Shift changes Venomoth's type until the end of the turn or until you use Shift again.
Shift can copy any type from any Pokemon in play except Colorless.
Venom Powder inflicts BOTH Confused and Poisoned on a heads flip.
